subject: Just replaced my 3.7 jar with 3.8
msgSnippet: Now when I try to run our AllTests suite, I get the following error: Failed to invoke suite(): java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError com/ibm/rmi/iiop/ORB So...why am
messageBody:
Now when I try to run our AllTests suite, I get the
following error:

Failed to invoke suite():
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError com/ibm/rmi/iiop/ORB

So...why am I getting this now with 3.8?
Did something major changed from 3.7 to 3.8 that would
cause this?

Thanks!

-Eric
